plugs.description: Causing damage with this weapon increases its stability.
plugs.name: Zen Moment

plugs.description: Final blows grant increased mobility, weapon range, and handling for a short duration.
plugs.name: Killing Wind

plugs.description: Precision kills greatly decrease reload time.
plugs.name: Outlaw

plugs.description: Increased movement speed and target acquisition when moving while aiming down sights.
plugs.name: Moving Target

plugs.description: Precision final blows grant a stacking range bonus to this weapon. Non-precision final blows remove range stacks but grant bonus accuracy and stability when all range stacks have been removed.
plugs.name: Encore

plugs.description: Final blows with this weapon increase accuracy and stability while improving vertical recoil.
plugs.name: Heating Up

plugs.description: This weapon gains bonus stability, handling, and reload speed while the wielder is in motion.
plugs.name: Perpetual Motion

plugs.description: Hitting three separate targets increases weapon handling, stability, reload, and range for a moderate duration.
plugs.name: Stats for All

plugs.description: Hitting three separate targets increases damage for a moderate duration.
plugs.name: One for All

plugs.description: Reloading after a precision final blow increases your rate of fire.
plugs.name: Desperado

plugs.description: Body shots landed with this weapon increase precision damage for a short time.
plugs.name: Headseeker

plugs.description:
Increases weapon handling and reload speed. Gain the following effects while you are the last living member of your fireteam:
• Increased target acquisition
• Increased handling and reload speed
• Reduced flinch from incoming fire
plugs.name: Celerity

plugs.description: Reloading after a kill grants increased damage.
plugs.name: Kill Clip

plugs.description: Being in combat for an extended time increases damage, handling, and reload for this weapon until you are out of combat.
plugs.name: Frenzy

plugs.description:
Increased stats based on the currently equipped subclass.
• [Solar] increases your reload speed.
• [Arc] increases handling.
• [Void] increases stability.
• [Stasis] moderately controls recoil and increases movement speed when aiming down sights.
plugs.name: Elemental Capacitor

plugs.description: Final blows with other weapons improve this weapon's damage and performance for a short duration.
plugs.name: Harmony

plugs.description: Faster reloads when the magazine is empty.
plugs.name: Alloy Magazine

plugs.description:
Optimized for fast reloading.
  •  Slightly increases stability
  •  Greatly increases reload speed
plugs.name: Flared Magwell

plugs.description: Missing a shot has a chance to return ammo directly to the magazine.
plugs.name: Mulligan

plugs.description: Increased ammo reserves. Faster reload, stow, and ready when you're crouching.
plugs.name: Field Prep

plugs.description: Aiming this weapon increases its effective range and zoom magnification. Increased projectile velocity while aiming Rocket Launchers, Grenade Launchers, and Bows.
plugs.name: Rangefinder

plugs.description: This weapon can be drawn unbelievably fast.
plugs.name: Quickdraw

plugs.description: Final blows grant increased mobility, weapon range, and handling for a short duration.
plugs.name: Killing Wind

plugs.description: Increases handling, reload speed, and stability for each fully charged ability.
plugs.name: Surplus

plugs.description: The holstered weapon is automatically reloaded after a short period of time.
plugs.name: Auto-Loading Holster

plugs.description: Increased movement speed and target acquisition when moving while aiming down sights.
plugs.name: Moving Target

plugs.description:
Increased stats based on the currently equipped subclass.
• [Solar] increases your reload speed.
• [Arc] increases handling.
• [Void] increases stability.
• [Stasis] moderately controls recoil and increases movement speed when aiming down sights.
plugs.name: Elemental Capacitor

plugs.description: Killing combatants with this weapon generates a small amount of Super energy.
plugs.name: Thresh

plugs.description: Faster time to aim down sights.
plugs.name: Snapshot Sights

plugs.description: Kills with this weapon temporarily grant increased damage. Stacks 3x.
plugs.name: Rampage

plugs.description: Massively improves weapon target acquisition at the cost of weapon range.
plugs.name: Iron Gaze

plugs.description: Massively improves weapon stability at the cost of reload speed.
plugs.name: Iron Grip

plugs.description: Rounds at the end of the magazine deal more damage.
plugs.name: High-Impact Reserves

Rounds Per Minute.name: Rounds Per Minute
Rounds Per Minute.description: The number of shots per minute this weapon can fire.

Impact.name: Impact
Impact.description: Increases the damage inflicted by each round.

Range.name: Range
Range.description: Increases the effective range of this weapon.

Stability.name: Stability
Stability.description: How much or little recoil you will experience while firing the weapon.

Handling.name: Handling
Handling.description: The speed with which the weapon can be readied and aimed.

Reload Speed.name: Reload Speed
Reload Speed.description: The time it takes to reload this weapon.

Magazine.name: Magazine
Magazine.description: The number of shots which can be fired before reloading.

Aim Assistance.name: Aim Assistance
Aim Assistance.description: The weapon's ability to augment your aim.

Attack.name: Attack
Attack.description: Higher Attack allows your weapons to damage higher-level opponents.

Inventory Size.name: Inventory Size
Inventory Size.description: How much ammo a player can hold in reserve.

Power.name: Power
Power.description: Raising your Power increases the damage your abilities deal against higher-level combatants.

Recoil Direction.name: Recoil Direction
Recoil Direction.description: The weapon's tendency to move while firing.

Zoom.name: Zoom
Zoom.description: How much the weapon's scope can zoom in on targets.
